metadata.description: Curated Renaissance images for Second Renaissance gallery
metadata.license_note: All images are Public Domain or CC-BY compatible

images.title: Man as Microcosm
images.description: The human body as microcosm reflecting the celestial macrocosm

images.title: Vitruvian Man
images.description: Leonardo's study of ideal human proportions based on Vitruvius

images.title: Ptolemaic Universe
images.description: Ptolemaic geocentric universe from Cellarius's celestial atlas

images.title: Splendor Solis
images.description: Alchemical treatise with stunning illuminated illustrations

images.title: The Muscle Men
images.description: Revolutionary anatomical illustration from the father of modern anatomy

images.title: Melencolia I
images.description: Dürer's enigmatic engraving filled with alchemical and magical symbolism

images.title: Garden of Earthly Delights
images.description: Bosch's surreal triptych of paradise, earthly pleasures, and hell

images.title: Flammarion Engraving
images.description: A traveler peers beyond the edge of the firmament to see the cosmic machinery

images.title: Kabbalistic Tree of Life
images.description: The Sephirotic Tree of Life diagram from Christian Kabbalah

images.title: Temple of the Rosy Cross
images.description: Allegorical depiction of the Rosicrucian Brotherhood's invisible college

images.title: Marsilio Ficino
images.description: Portrait of the translator who sparked the Renaissance Hermetic revival

images.title: Paracelsus
images.description: The revolutionary physician-alchemist who transformed medical practice

images.title: Giordano Bruno
images.description: The Hermetic philosopher burned for heresy in 1600

images.title: Monas Hieroglyphica
images.description: Dee's hieroglyphic symbol encoding all cosmic wisdom

images.title: Gutenberg Bible Page
images.description: The first major book printed with movable type in the West

images.title: Atalanta Fugiens - Emblem
images.description: Alchemical emblem book combining images, text, and music

images.title: Aurora Consurgens
images.description: Medieval alchemical manuscript attributed to Thomas Aquinas

images.title: Mutus Liber - Title Page
images.description: Wordless alchemical book communicating the Great Work through images alone

images.title: Ripley Scroll
images.description: Symbolic alchemical scroll depicting the Great Work

images.title: The Alchemist
images.description: Satirical depiction of an alchemist wasting his family's fortune

images.title: Heliocentric System
images.description: Copernicus's revolutionary diagram placing the Sun at the center

images.title: Hermes Trismegistus
images.description: The legendary sage Hermes Trismegistus, author of the Hermetic Corpus

images.title: Phoenix and the Philosopher's Stone
images.description: The phoenix rising from the flames, symbol of alchemical transformation

images.title: Nicolas Flamel
images.description: The legendary alchemist said to have achieved the Philosopher's Stone

images.title: Heinrich Khunrath
images.description: German physician, alchemist, and Hermetic philosopher

images.title: Ramon Llull
images.description: Majorcan philosopher who influenced Renaissance magic and combinatorics

images.title: Pico della Mirandola
images.description: Author of the Oration on the Dignity of Man, synthesizer of Kabbalah and Hermeticism

images.title: Cornelius Agrippa
images.description: Author of Three Books of Occult Philosophy, master of Renaissance magic

images.title: John Dee
images.description: Elizabethan mathematician, astrologer, and advisor to Queen Elizabeth I

images.title: Elias Ashmole
images.description: Antiquary, collector, and founder of the Ashmolean Museum

images.title: Ouroboros
images.description: The serpent eating its own tail, symbol of eternal return and unity

images.title: Rebis - Hermetic Androgyne
images.description: The alchemical rebis, symbol of the union of opposites

images.title: Medieval Zodiac
images.description: Medieval diagram of zodiacal signs and celestial influences

images.title: Francis Bacon
images.description: Father of empiricism and the scientific method

images.title: Emerald Tablet
images.description: Depiction of the legendary Emerald Tablet of Hermes Trismegistus

images.title: Alchemical Laboratory
images.description: An alchemist's laboratory with furnaces and distillation equipment

images.title: Nostradamus
images.description: French astrologer and prophet, author of Les Prophéties

images.title: The Creation of Adam
images.description: Michelangelo's iconic fresco of divine creation

images.title: The School of Athens
images.description: Raphael's celebration of classical philosophy and knowledge

images.title: Primavera
images.description: Botticelli's allegorical painting of spring and classical mythology

images.title: Athanasius Kircher
images.description: Jesuit polymath who wrote on Egyptology, geology, and universal knowledge

images.title: Utriusque Cosmi
images.description: Fludd's cosmological diagram showing the universe's structure

images.title: Figura Intellectus
images.description: Bruno's diagram of the intellect from his memory treatise

images.title: Ashmole Bestiary
images.description: Medieval bestiary with allegorical animal illustrations

images.title: Ars Magna Figure
images.description: Llull's combinatorial logic diagram for discovering universal truths

images.title: Cabala: Nature & Art
images.description: Alchemical-Kabbalistic illustration showing nature and art united

images.title: Corpus Hermeticum
images.description: Title page of the foundational Hermetic texts attributed to Hermes Trismegistus

images.title: Three Suns Emblem
images.description: Alchemical emblem depicting three suns representing transmutation stages

images.title: Fama Fraternitatis
images.description: First Rosicrucian manifesto announcing the secret brotherhood

images.title: Lapis Philosophorum
images.description: The Philosophers' Stone, goal of the alchemical Great Work

images.title: Theatrum Chemicum Britannicum
images.description: Ashmole's collection of English alchemical poetry and texts

images.title: Musaeum Hermeticum
images.description: Major compendium of alchemical texts and treatises

images.title: Atalanta Fugiens Emblem
images.description: Emblem from Maier's alchemical emblem book with musical fugues

images.title: Fourth Book of Occult Philosophy
images.description: Magical text attributed to Cornelius Agrippa

images.title: Allegory of Astronomy
images.description: Allegorical depiction of astronomy and celestial knowledge

images.title: Kepler's Supernova
images.description: Kepler's observation of the 1604 supernova in Ophiuchus

images.title: Steganographia
images.description: Trithemius's treatise on cryptography disguised as angel magic

images.title: Medieval Bestiary
images.description: Illuminated bestiary with symbolic animal representations

images.title: Kabbalistic Creator
images.description: Kabbalistic diagram of divine emanation and creation

images.title: The Alchemical Sisters
images.description: Allegorical depiction of alchemical processes as female figures

images.title: Tower of Babel
images.description: Architectural reconstruction of the Tower of Babel with cutaway interior

images.title: Map of Atlantis
images.description: One of the earliest maps of Plato's lost continent positioned in the Atlantic Ocean

images.title: China Illustrata Frontispiece
images.description: Jesuit missionaries Matteo Ricci and Johann Adam Schall with Society founders above

images.title: Magnetic Clock
images.description: Intricate mechanical clock using hidden magnets, demonstrating Kircher's fascination with magnetism

images.title: Anima Mundi
images.description: The World Soul connecting all levels of existence from spiritual to material

images.title: Summum Bonum - The Rose Cross
images.description: Rose Cross symbol with inscription 'The Rose Gives Honey to Bees' - Rosicrucian defense

images.title: The Ape of Nature
images.description: Wheel of divination with the Ape of Nature at center - man's imitation of nature's creation

images.title: Selenographia Frontispiece
images.description: Alhazen and Galileo flank a telescope, with the Moon's surface above - first detailed lunar atlas

images.title: Novum Organum Frontispiece
images.description: Ship sailing through Pillars of Hercules - 'Many will travel and knowledge will increase'

images.title: Leviathan Frontispiece
images.description: Crowned sovereign rising above landscape, body composed of 300 citizens - political philosophy masterpiece

images.title: Epitome of the Almagest
images.description: Ptolemy and Regiomontanus beneath armillary sphere - most important 15th century astronomy text

images.title: Mysterium Cosmographicum
images.description: Nested Platonic solids representing the heavens - Kepler's first astronomical work

images.title: The Alchemist's Laboratory
images.description: Famous lab-oratorium showing laboratory work and prayer oratory united - 'Pray and Work'

images.title: Barchusen's Laboratory
images.description: Transitional image - alchemy becoming chemistry, with apparatus and instruments

images.title: Nigredo - Philosophia Reformata
images.description: Skeleton, crow, and black sun - the putrefaction stage of the Great Work

images.title: Sidereus Nuncius - Moon Observations
images.description: Galileo's revolutionary telescopic drawings of the Moon's surface

images.title: The Flea
images.description: Famous fold-out engraving of a flea - first scientific best-seller

images.title: Principia Mathematica
images.description: Title page of the foundational work of classical mechanics

images.title: Copernican Universe
images.description: Stunning baroque rendering of the Copernican heliocentric system

images.title: Rhinoceros
images.description: From the first modern zoological encyclopedia - based on Dürer's famous woodcut

images.title: Rhinoceros
images.description: Dürer's iconic rhinoceros - made without seeing the animal, yet widely copied for centuries

images.title: Atalanta Fugiens Emblem 21
images.description: Make a circle of man and woman, then a square, then a triangle - geometric alchemy

images.title: Atalanta Fugiens Emblem 42
images.description: The philosophical egg in the furnace - incubation of the Great Work

images.title: Euclid's Elements
images.description: First printed edition of Euclid - foundation of mathematical knowledge

images.title: Camera Obscura
images.description: Della Porta's camera obscura - natural magic becomes optical science

images.title: Temple of Music
images.description: Fludd's fantastical Temple of Music - an architectural mnemonic encoding seven books of musical instruction

images.title: Musical Consonance
images.description: Diagram of musical consonance showing how intervals relate to cosmic principles

images.title: Pythagoras Discovering Harmony
images.description: Pythagoras discovering musical harmonies through bells, glasses, monochord, and flutes

images.title: The Music of the Spheres
images.description: Apollo with the nine Muses corresponding to planetary spheres - the cosmic harmony of musica universalis

images.title: Harmonia
images.description: Theoretical diagram of musical harmony and proportion from Gaffurio's treatise

images.title: Bird Song Notation
images.description: First scientific notation of birdsong - nightingale, cock, hen, cuckoo, quail, and a parrot saying 'hello'

images.title: Pneumatic Instruments
images.description: Comprehensive diagram of wind-powered musical instruments and automatic organs

images.title: Stringed Instruments
images.description: Diagram of polychord instruments including the Orpharion and various historical strings

images.title: Atalanta Fugiens Emblem XXI
images.description: Make a circle of man and woman - geometric alchemy with musical accompaniment

images.title: Atalanta Fugiens Emblem XLII
images.description: Alchemical emblem from the first multimedia publication - art, text, poetry, and music combined

images.title: Homo Volans - The Flying Man
images.description: The earliest known parachute design - a man descending from a tower with a rectangular canopy

images.title: Sea Monster
images.description: Woodcut from the chronicle of prodigies featuring monstrous creatures and portents

images.title: The Magic Lantern
images.description: First published illustration of a magic lantern - projecting images with light and lenses

images.title: Adam Tilling the Earth
images.description: Adam laboring after the Fall - the origin of human mortality

images.title: Emblematum Liber Title Page
images.description: The first emblem book ever printed - inaugurating a new Renaissance art form

images.title: Emblem I
images.description: First emblem from Alciato - image and motto combining visual and verbal wisdom

images.title: Astrologos (The Astrologers)
images.description: Emblem satirizing astrologers - warning against false divination

images.title: Witches' Sabbath Banquet
images.description: Witches and sorcerers feasting at the Sabbath - from the most illustrated witchcraft treatise

images.title: Pact with the Devil
images.description: A witch making a pact with the Devil - signing away the soul

images.title: Compendium Maleficarum Title Page
images.description: Title page of the Compendium of Witches - the most illustrated demonology text

images.title: The Preacher
images.description: Death lurks behind the preacher at the pulpit - even the clergy cannot escape

images.title: The Empress
images.description: Death claims the Empress - no crown protects against mortality

images.title: The Book Wheel
images.description: The rotating book wheel - Renaissance information retrieval device for scholars 'tormented by gout'

images.title: Sigillum Dei Aemeth
images.description: John Dee's Seal of God - wax talisman used in angel magic rituals with Edward Kelley

images.title: The Philosopher's Stone
images.description: Khunrath's vision of the Philosopher's Stone - the goal of the alchemical Great Work

images.title: Scheme of Christian Kabbalism
images.description: Christian Kabbalistic diagram uniting alchemical and mystical wisdom

images.title: Syzygy - Macrocosm and Microcosm
images.description: The conjunction of macrocosmic unity with microcosmic trinity - as above, so below

images.title: The Cosmic Rose
images.description: The Cosmic Rose with the Tetragrammaton - divine wisdom radiating through creation

images.title: The Hermaphrodite
images.description: The alchemical hermaphrodite - union of masculine and feminine principles in the Great Work

images.title: Porta Amphitheatri - The Gate of Eternal Wisdom
images.description: The gateway to the Amphitheater of Eternal Wisdom - entrance to alchemical knowledge

images.title: The Emerald Tablet
images.description: Khunrath's Tabula Smaragdina - the foundational Hermetic text 'As above, so below'

images.title: John Dee's Crystal Ball
images.description: Dee's quartz crystal used for scrying and spirit communication with Edward Kelley

images.title: John Dee's Obsidian Mirror
images.description: Aztec obsidian mirror used by Dee as a 'shew-stone' for conjuring spirits

images.title: John Dee's Golden Disc
images.description: Engraved golden disc showing the 'Vision of the Four Castles' received during angel sessions

images.title: John Dee Performing an Experiment before Elizabeth I
images.description: Glindoni's dramatic painting of Dee demonstrating his experiments at the Elizabethan court

images.title: The Holy Table
images.description: Dee's Holy Table for angel magic - engraved with Enochian letters and the Sigillum Dei at center

images.title: Chymische Schriften
images.description: Frontispiece of the legendary Benedictine alchemist's collected works

images.title: Azoth
images.description: Title page of Azoth - the universal solvent and secret fire of the alchemists

images.title: Basilica Chymica
images.description: Paracelsian chemical medicine treatise - key text of iatrochemistry

images.title: Symbola Aureae Mensae
images.description: Twelve alchemists of twelve nations gathered at the Golden Table

images.title: Liber de Arte Distillandi
images.source: Liber de Arte Distillandi de Compositis
images.description: The first printed book on distillation - foundational text for chemical arts

images.title: Viridarium Chymicum - Four Elements
images.description: The Chemical Pleasure Garden - emblems of the four elements

images.title: Rosarium Philosophorum
images.description: The Rosary of the Philosophers - the androgynous Rebis, union of Sol and Luna

images.title: Aurora Consurgens - The Queen
images.description: The Rising Dawn - alchemical wisdom personified as Sophia

images.title: Geheime Figuren - Sophia
images.description: Secret Symbols of the Rosicrucians - mystical depiction of Divine Wisdom

images.title: Utriusque Cosmi Historia
images.description: Fludd's monumental work on the macrocosm and microcosm with famous de Bry engravings

images.title: Monas Hieroglyphica - Title Page
images.description: Title page of Dee's Hieroglyphic Monad - his symbol unifying all creation

images.title: Atalanta Fugiens - Emblem
images.description: Merian's engraving from Maier's alchemical emblem book with musical fugues

images.title: Speculum Sophicum Rhodo-Stauroticum
images.description: The Rosicrucian Mirror of Wisdom - illustration from the Rosicrucian controversy

images.title: 900 Conclusiones
images.description: Pico's 900 theses uniting Kabbalah, Hermeticism, and Christian philosophy

images.title: De Verbo Mirifico
images.description: On the Wonder-Working Word - Reuchlin's foundational text of Christian Kabbalah

images.title: Citadel of the Philosophers
images.description: The Citadel of the Philosophers - alchemical fortress of wisdom

images.title: Amphitheatrum Plate 2
images.description: Symbolic engraving from Khunrath's Amphitheatrum Sapientiae Aeternae

images.title: Amphitheatrum Plate 3
images.description: Symbolic engraving from Khunrath's Amphitheatrum Sapientiae Aeternae

images.title: Amphitheatrum Plate 4
images.description: Symbolic engraving from Khunrath's Amphitheatrum Sapientiae Aeternae

images.title: Amphitheatrum Plate 5
images.description: Symbolic engraving from Khunrath's Amphitheatrum Sapientiae Aeternae

images.title: Amphitheatrum Plate 6
images.description: Symbolic engraving from Khunrath's Amphitheatrum Sapientiae Aeternae

images.title: Amphitheatrum Plate 8
images.description: Symbolic engraving from Khunrath's Amphitheatrum Sapientiae Aeternae

images.title: Oedipus Aegyptiacus
images.description: Kircher's monumental work on Egyptian hieroglyphics, Kabbalah, and ancient wisdom

images.title: De Occulta Philosophia
images.description: Three Books of Occult Philosophy - the foundation of Western ceremonial magic

images.title: De Umbris Idearum
images.description: The Shadows of Ideas - Bruno's memory palace system with combinatorial wheels

images.title: Hypnerotomachia Poliphili
images.description: Strife of Love in a Dream - the most beautiful illustrated book of the Renaissance

images.title: Ars Magna Generalis
images.description: The Great Art - Llull's combinatorial system for discovering truth

images.title: Theosophia Revelata
images.description: Revealed Theosophy - Böhme's mystical visions of divine nature

images.title: Utriusque Cosmi Vol. II
images.description: Fludd's microcosm volume with de Bry engravings on music, memory, and the soul

images.title: The Macrocosm and Microcosm
images.description: Man as microcosm reflecting the macrocosm - 'As above, so below'

images.title: Magia Naturalis
images.description: Natural Magic - Renaissance science of hidden properties and sympathies

images.title: Splendor Solis - Alchemical Plate
images.description: The Splendor of the Sun - most beautiful alchemical manuscript illuminations

images.title: Anatomical Studies
images.description: Leonardo's pioneering anatomical drawings from over 30 dissections

images.title: Celestial Hierarchy
images.description: The nine orders of angels - foundation of medieval celestial cosmology

images.title: Alchemical Manuscript
images.description: Newton's secret alchemical experiments - the hidden side of the scientist

images.title: The Ripley Scroll
images.description: Medieval alchemical scroll showing the stages of the Great Work

images.description: Leonardo's designs for flying machines and ornithopters

images.description: Studies of bird wings and human-powered flight

images.description: Early parachute design

images.title: Stone-Heng - Perspective View
images.source: The Most Notable Antiquity of Great Britain - Internet Archive
images.description: Perspective view of reconstructed Stonehenge

images.title: Design for Masque of Blackness
images.description: Costume design for Ben Jonson's Masque of Blackness

images.description: Character designs for the masque Britannia Triumphans

images.description: Masque costume design - Page as fiery spirit

images.title: Tethys Festival Nymph
images.description: Costume design for Tethys' Festival nymph

images.description: Character costume design - Mouse trap dealer

images.title: Alchemist's Laboratory (Oratory-Laboratory)
images.artist: Heinrich Khunrath / Hans Vredeman de Vries
images.description: The famous Oratory-Laboratory plate showing prayer and alchemical work united

images.title: Portrait of Cornelis Drebbel
images.description: Engraving of Cornelis Drebbel (1572-1633), Dutch inventor and alchemist

images.title: Drebbel's Perpetuum Mobile
images.description: The atmospheric pressure clock that ran without winding

images.title: Drebbel's Self-Regulating Oven
images.description: Diagram of the first feedback control system - a thermostatically regulated furnace

images.title: Drebbel's Submarine on the Thames
images.description: Historical painting of the first navigable submarine (1620)

images.title: Japanese Diagram of Drebbel's Thermostat
images.description: Japanese diagram showing Drebbel's feedback control system with Chinese text

images.title: Drebbel's Egg Incubator
images.description: Historical diagram of Drebbel's thermostatically-controlled egg incubator

images.title: Drebbel Submarine Replica
images.description: Modern replica of Drebbel's submarine built for BBC documentary
